lyrics.title: Stay forever
lyrics.content:
Ooh… hey yeah yeah

Come on, let's fly away, girl
Up on cloud number nine I'd wish to flow
You're my most precious pearl
Hmm… waiting for you, that's all I need to know

Wait and see how it's gonna be
Hold my hand, just don't let go
Birds of a feather flock together
But time will tell, people say, so

Stay forever and ever
You will always be my baby
Stay forever, I'll never hurt you
I won't make you cry, no, no, no

Stay forever, no matter what may happen
Don't give up on me
Do whatever, I'll never let go
I will catch your fall

Through our sunny and dark sides of life
Feelings like this are made to survive
What the rest of the world thinks doesn't matter
Because we know it better

Stay forever and ever
You will always be my baby
Stay forever, I'll never hurt you
I won't make you cry, no, no, no

Stay forever, no matter what may happen
Don't give up on me
Do whatever, I'll never let go
I will catch your fall

Stay forever and ever
You will alwayѕ be my baby, baby
Stay forever, I'll never hurt you
I won't mаke you cry

lyrics.title: Ostani za vedno
lyrics.content:
Z mano boš poletela
Tja v sedma nebesa si želim
Vsega si me prevzela
Saj noči vse le s tabo prebedim

Pustiva času čas ta zna
Obrniti vse po svoje
Med nama kemija reagira
Ko znajdeva se v dvoje

Daj ostani za vedno
Tu na sončni strani živijenja
Daj ostani za vedno
Da le s tabo diham, živim
Dan za dnem
Daj ostani za vedno
Uresniči vsa hrepenenja
Daj ostani, ker le s teboj
Vse kar boli pretrpim

Pridejo časi še dobri in slabi
Kjer čustev kot teh ne pozabi
Le ena pot naj bila bi prava
Midva jo že poznava

Daj ostani za vedno
Tu na sončni strani živijenja
Daj ostani za vedno
Da le s tabo diham, živim
Dan za dnem
Daj ostani za vedno
Uresniči vsa hrepenenja
Daj ostani, ker le s teboj
Vse kar boli pretrpim

Daj ostani za vedno
Tu na sončni strani živijenja
Daj ostani za vedno
Da le ѕ tabo dihаm, živim
